casebody.data:
STATE
v.
William Joseph MOORE. No. 460A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 14, 2008. Marilyn G. Ozer, William F.W. Massengale, Chapel Hill, for Moore. Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of January 2008 by the State of NC for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. State of NC shall have up to and including the 13th day of February 2008 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of January 2008."
